summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 5441 lux), and cloud levels (up 591 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1520 m), light levels (up 7711 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 591.3m lower than yesterday, 1070.6m lower than past week, 1520.3m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1282.0m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky. Showers, the sky’s high clouds will permit plenty of sunshine, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
